personalMetaData.title: Web Developer
personalMetaData.about: Avid junior full-stack developer with a keen interested in lower level languages such as C++. Currently studying toward a BSc in Computing and IT.

volunteering.aboutOrganisation: Code First Girls is a organisation dedicated to helping women develop in tech by providing free education opportunity. They have so far taught in excess of 14 thousand women how to code.
volunteering.myRole: I am a proud CFG volunteer instructor and have assisted the teaching of both Web Development and Python courses to students at Sussex University and online for the past

volunteering.aboutOrganisation: Children of the Mokong is a charitable organisation that fights child poverty and suffering in South-East Asia.

volunteering.aboutOrganisation: Sova is a charity that works in the heart of communities in England and Wales to help people steer clear of crime.
